Q

QBoard - Class in quadrillion
Defines a board class, composed of four QGrid objects, and maps the necessary geometric transformations from the local coordinate system of the grids to the "world" coordinate system of the board.
QBoard(List<QGrid>, List<QCoordinate>, QBoardType) - Constructor for class quadrillion.QBoard
 
QBoardFactory - Class in quadrillion
Defines a factory class for board construction.
QBoardFactory() - Constructor for class quadrillion.QBoardFactory
 
QBoardType - Enum in quadrillion
Defines an enumeration for the type of the boards.
QCoordinate - Class in quadrillion
Defines a simple integer two-tuple for the representation of 2D coordinates, for modelling purposes of Quadrillion.
QGame - Class in quadrillion
Defines a game of Quadrillion in the style of Gazillion, using QPiece objects, a QBoard object, a QTimer object, and provides the necessary functionality for piece placement and removal to and from the board.
QGame(QBoard, long) - Constructor for class quadrillion.QGame
Constructor for the game object.
QGrid - Class in quadrillion
Defines a Grid class, which implicitly has a bounding box of (0,0) to (3,-3), i.e.
QGrid(List<QCoordinate>, List<QCoordinate>, QGridType) - Constructor for class quadrillion.QGrid
Constructs a grid given the blocking tiles on each face.
QGridFactory - Class in quadrillion
Defines a factory class for grid construction.
QGridFactory() - Constructor for class quadrillion.QGridFactory
 
QGridType - Enum in quadrillion
Defines an enumeration for the type of the grids.
QPiece - Class in quadrillion
Defines a piece by storing the coordinates occupied by the piece explicitly in its local coordinate system.
QPieceFactory - Class in quadrillion
Defines a factory class for pieces as present in the original Quadrillion game.
QPieceFactory() - Constructor for class quadrillion.QPieceFactory
 
QPieceType - Enum in quadrillion
Defines an enumeration for the type of the pieces.
QTimer - Class in quadrillion
Defines a timer for the game that runs on a separate thread.
QTimer(long) - Constructor for class quadrillion.QTimer
Constructs a QTimer instance.
quadrillion - package quadrillion
